post.message:
I don't personally find this content funny, but I don't understand why it was disallowed. I think the order of actions here was backwards. We should have first established the Jokes & Memes section (https://github.com/wearehx/policies/blob/content-policy/content-policy.md#jokes-and-memes) before determining that this post was out of bounds.

It seems arbitrary that this joke was closed. Especially because the content policy also mentions nothing about drugs or drug paraphernalia. 

I think until there is a section on jokes and memes they shouldn't really be closed. Within reason of course.
